TEXT.TITLE: PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC <PE> TO SELL BONDS
TEXT.BODY: Philadelphia Electric Co said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a shelf registration statement covering up to 250 mln dlrs of first and refunding mortgage bonds. Proceeds will be used for the company's construction program and to reduce short-term debt that may be incurred from time to time for interim financing of such building, Philadelphia Electric said. Reuter
